name: analyze_bone_microct_morphometry
description: Analyze bone microarchitecture parameters from 3D micro-CT images including bone mineral density, bone volume, trabecular number/thickness/separation.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.name: input_file_path
inputs.description: Path to micro-CT scan data file

inputs.name: threshold_value
inputs.description: Threshold for bone segmentation (defaults to Otsu's method if None)

output.description: Research log summarizing analysis steps and bone microarchitecture results
